A_exclusive.point: Enthusiastic and outgoing, A is eager to make a good impression and build connections with colleagues.
Initiates conversation and takes a proactive role in the team-building exercise, suggesting ideas and encouraging group participation.
To successfully complete the team-building task and establish a positive rapport with B and other team members.
A has a background in team sports and is accustomed to working in collaborative environments, which they believe will be an asset in the office setting.

B_exclusive.point: Thoughtful and a bit introverted, B is more reserved but highly observant and detail-oriented.
Listens intently to the ideas presented and contributes constructively, ensuring that the team's approach is well-thought-out and practical.
To contribute meaningfully to the team's success in the exercise and to begin forming a professional relationship with A and the rest of the group.
B has a history of working independently and is looking forward to the opportunity to develop their teamwork skills in this new role.
